title: Verify Local Build and Run
description: Confirm development environment works end-to-end with free Apple ID. App builds without errors, runs from Xcode, runs from build folder, no code signing errors.
close_reason: Verified: Debug and Release builds succeed, app launches from build folder, no code signing errors

title: FSEvents File Watching
description: Monitor notes folder for external changes using FSEvents. Detect new files, deleted files, renamed files, content changes. Batch rapid changes (debounce 100-200ms). Works with nested directories.

title: Unsaved Note Indicator
description: Visually distinguish notes not yet saved to disk. Show [unsaved] instead of filename in path display, styled orange italic. Once saved, shows actual filename. Update immediately when file written.

title: Edge Case Documentation
description: Document edge cases discovered during daily use: Unicode filenames, very long filenames, large files (10MB+), unusual extensions, symlinks, network drives, iCloud sync conflicts, files open in multiple apps.

title: Basic Keyboard Navigation (Tab Cycling)
description: Full keyboard navigation between panes. App launch: search focused. Tab from Search: select first note, focus list. Down Arrow from Search: same. Tab from List: focus editor. Shift-Tab reverses. Escape from Editor: return to list. 'Every beep is a bug.'
close_reason: Full keyboard navigation: Tab/Down from search to list (auto-selects first), Tab/Enter from list to editor, Shift-Tab reverses, Escape from editor to list. No beeps.

title: Performance Optimization for Large File Sets
description: Ensure app remains fast with 1000+ files. Startup with 5000 files: <1 second. Search across 5000 files: <100ms per keystroke. Memory <200MB. 60fps scrolling. No UI freezes. Profile with Instruments.

title: Nested Folder Path Display
description: Show relative path for files in nested directories. Files in root show no path indicator. Path displayed in muted/secondary text style, relative to notes folder root.

title: Text Editor View
description: Implement functional plain text editor in the right pane. Multi-line editing, standard shortcuts (Cmd+C/V/Z), monospace font. No rich text - paste strips formatting. Consider NSTextView via NSViewRepresentable for better control.
close_reason: PlainTextEditor using NSTextView via NSViewRepresentable: monospace font, paste strips formatting, Shift-Tab/Escape interception, undo support, standard Cmd+C/V/Z work natively

title: Search Term Highlighting
description: Highlight search terms within file list previews and editor. Visual highlighting in titles/subtitles and editor content when loading search result. Toggle option in settings.

title: Adjust List Width constraint
description: Review and adjust the max-width constraint of the file list (currently 350) to allow for wider views on large screens.

title: Initialize GitHub Repository
description: Create the GitHub repository with appropriate initial structure. Include README with project description, MIT license, .gitignore for Xcode/Swift projects.
close_reason: Created private GitHub repository at https://github.com/msnodderly/neonv and pushed initial code

title: Add First Line Preview to File List
description: Ensure the file list displays a preview of the file's first line. Verify if current 'displayTitle' implementation is sufficient or if a separate preview line is needed.

title: Create Xcode Project with Universal Binary Target
description: Initialize Xcode project configured for macOS app with universal binary support (arm64 + x86_64). Use SwiftUI lifecycle, deployment target macOS 14.0 (Sonoma) for .onKeyPress support.
close_reason: Xcode project created with macOS 14.0 target, SwiftUI lifecycle, universal binary verified (arm64 + x86_64)

title: Unified Search/Create Bar
description: Unify search and file creation in single input. If matches exist: Enter selects top match. If no matches: Enter creates new file with search text as content/title. Show visual indication: 'X matches' vs 'Enter to create'. Escape clears search.
close_reason: Implemented unified search/create bar with Enter to create, match count display, and Escape to clear

title: Double-Bracket Wiki-Links
description: Implement wiki-style linking between notes using [[double brackets]]. Click or Cmd-Click opens corresponding note. Auto-complete note titles while typing inside brackets. Offer to create if linked note doesn't exist.

title: Auto-Save on Edit (Atomic Write)
description: Implement continuous auto-save using atomic write operations. Debounce 300-500ms after typing stops. Write to temp file then rename. Verify write succeeded. Show dirty indicator while unsaved changes exist. Critical for data integrity.
close_reason: Auto-save with 500ms debounce, atomic write (temp file + rename), dirty indicator in toolbar, background save

title: Homebrew Cask Formula
description: Create and submit Homebrew Cask formula. Test locally with brew install --cask. Submit PR to homebrew-cask or personal tap.

title: File List View (Sorted by Modification Time)
description: Display discovered files in left pane sorted by modification time (newest first). Primary text: first line of file content (~50 chars, truncated). Secondary text: path/filename in muted color. Strip markdown formatting from display titles.
close_reason: Already implemented in neonv-qwc: notes sorted by mod time, displayTitle with markdown stripping (50 char limit), relativePath in muted secondary color

title: Extended Keyboard Shortcuts
description: Additional keyboard shortcuts: Cmd-L focus search and select text, Cmd-N create new note, Cmd-P toggle preview, Cmd-Z/Shift-Z undo/redo, Cmd-A select all, Esc return to search and clear, Enter in search/list behaviors.

title: Daily Use Tracking
description: Track daily use to validate the app solves the problem. Use app as primary text capture tool for 30 consecutive days. Document friction points and missing features. Track files created, searches performed, saves.

title: Basic Fuzzy Search
description: Implement fuzzy search that filters file list in real-time as user types. Match against filename and file contents. Results update <50ms. Empty search shows all files sorted by modification time. Case-insensitive. Target: 1000 files in <100ms.
close_reason: Implemented fuzzy search filtering with content preview and real-time filtering

title: Horizontal Layout Option
description: Alternative layout where file list is at top (horizontal) instead of side. Setting to toggle between Vertical (default) and Horizontal layouts. Horizontal shows multi-line previews. Search bar remains at top.

title: Automatic List-Bullet Formatting
description: Improve editing experience with automatic list continuation. Pressing Enter on list line (*, -, 1.) starts next list item. Tab/Shift-Tab indent/outdent list items. Smart conversion of markdown list markers.

title: Change naming to 'neonv' lowercase in user-facing text
description: Update user-facing text to use 'neonv' (lowercase) instead of 'NeoNV'. Includes: app titlebar/window title, README.md, About dialog, app description. Does NOT require code/folder refactoring - just display strings.

title: Change license from MIT to GPLv3
description: Replace MIT license with GPLv3 for compatibility with Notational Velocity (NV is GPLv3). Update LICENSE file and any license headers/notices in code files. Verify compatibility with dependencies (should all be system frameworks).

title: Code Signing Configuration
description: Configure Xcode project for Developer ID signing. Enable Hardened Runtime. Build succeeds with signing. Validate with codesign -v.

title: Basic Window with Three-Pane Layout
description: Create the main window with three-pane layout: search bar at top, file list on left, editor on right. Use HSplitView for panes. Search box must be focused on app launch. Window should remember size/position between launches.
close_reason: Three-pane layout implemented: search bar at top, file list on left (HSplitView), editor on right. @FocusState manages focus, search auto-focused on launch.

title: Update NoteStore selection after 'Save As' recovery
Settings Panel
description: Settings window (Cmd+,) for user configuration: notes folder location, default file extension (.txt/.md/.org), font size, global hotkey customization. Settings persist between launches, changes apply immediately.

title: Document PR-based workflow guidance
close_reason: Completed: Documented mandatory PR-based workflow in AGENTS.md

title: External Edit Detection and Reload
description: When currently-open file is modified externally: if local buffer clean, auto-reload silently with toast. If local buffer dirty, show conflict dialog with options: Keep mine, Use external, View diff. Never silently overwrite unsaved local changes.

title: Tagging Support (OpenMeta/Spotlight)
description: Support for tagging notes using macOS OpenMeta or Spotlight-compatible tags. Add/Edit tags for selected notes. Auto-complete tags. Search notes by tags. Sync tags to file metadata.

title: Open in External Editor (Cmd-G)
description: Allow users to quickly open current note in external text editor (Cmd-G or Ctrl-X Ctrl-E). Opens in default system editor or user-configured preference. App detects external saves and reloads.

title: Apple Developer Account Setup
description: Enroll in Apple Developer Program (9/year) for code signing. Create Developer ID Application certificate and install in Keychain.

title: Show in Finder
description: Command to reveal selected note file in macOS Finder. Menu item and/or keyboard shortcut. Opens Finder window with file selected. Works for files in nested directories.

title: Hide Search Field on Drag
description: Allow hiding the search field by dragging the divider to the top or left of window (classic NV behavior). Visual indicator or shortcut to reveal again. Remembers hidden state.

title: Notarization Pipeline
description: Set up notarization with Apple. Create app-specific password. Notarize via xcrun notarytool. Staple notarization ticket to app. App passes Gatekeeper on clean Mac.

title: New File Creation with Auto-Naming
description: When creating new file, derive filename from first line (sanitized for filesystem). If empty/unsuitable, use timestamp format. File extension matches user preference. Handle filename conflicts by appending number.

title: Save Failure Handling (Loud Errors)
description: When auto-save fails, immediately alert user with modal dialog. Show file path and error. Block further editing until resolved. Offer: Retry, Save elsewhere, Copy to clipboard, Show in Finder. Prevent quit with unsaved changes.
close_reason: Implemented comprehensive save failure handling with modal alerts, recovery options, and quit prevention

title: Load File into Editor
description: When a file is selected in the list, load its contents into the editor. Handle large files (1MB+) without blocking UI. UTF-8 encoding, graceful error handling for unreadable files.
close_reason: Async file loading with Task.detached, graceful error handling, MainActor for thread safety

title: Search Within Note (Cmd-F)
description: Implement standard Find functionality (Cmd-F) within current note in editor. Shows search field in editor pane, highlights matches, Enter/Shift-Enter cycles through matches, Esc dismisses find bar.

title: Adjust List Width constraint
description: Review and adjust the max-width constraint of the file list (currently 350). It may be too narrow for long titles or previews on large windows.

title: Folder Selection and File Discovery
description: Allow user to select a folder via standard macOS open panel. Remember selected folder between launches. Discover all .txt, .md, .markdown, .org, .text files recursively (case-insensitive). Handle empty folders and 1000+ files gracefully.
close_reason: Folder selection via NSOpenPanel, security-scoped bookmarks for persistence, recursive file discovery for .txt/.md/.markdown/.org/.text, sorted by modification time

title: Add First Line Preview to File List
description: Ensure the file list displays a preview of the file's first line. Currently, the first line is used as the display title. Verify if a separate preview line is desired below the title.

title: Transparent Database Encryption
description: Optional encryption for note content on disk. Option to encrypt notes folder with master password. Files encrypted/decrypted transparently by app. Uses standard strong encryption (AES-256).

title: Global Hotkey to Summon App
description: System-wide keyboard shortcut to show/focus app from anywhere. Default: Cmd+Shift+N. Works when app is in background, hidden, or not running. Brings window to front and focuses search bar. Works across Spaces/desktops.

title: TaskPaper-style Strikethrough (@done)
description: Support TaskPaper-compatible strikethrough formatting. Lines containing @done tag rendered with strikethrough in editor/preview. Optional shortcut to toggle @done on current line.

title: GitHub Releases Setup
description: Configure GitHub Releases for distributing builds. First release with DMG attached. Establish release notes template. Semantic versioning (v1.0.0). Stable download URL for Homebrew.

title: Markdown Preview Toggle
description: Optional preview pane showing rendered markdown. Toggle via Cmd-P or toolbar button. Preview replaces editor (not side-by-side). Keyboard scrollable. Type-to-exit: any letter/number key switches to editor mode instantly.

title: DMG Creation
description: Create drag-to-install DMG for distribution. Contains app and Applications folder alias. Optional custom background. DMG is signed and notarized. Opens correctly, drag-to-install works.
